news.image_caption: New TF Grid Version on Testnet
news.content:
ðŸ“£ ThreeFold Grid v3.6.0 is Live on Testnet!


TF Grid v3.6.0 is now live on testnet and available for public testing! This update includes TF Playground v1.4.3, the ownCloud Deployer, Uhuru v1.2 (Beta), Planetary Network v0.3.0, and more.


  • Full announcement
  • Release notes

ðŸ§ª As a reminder, weâ€™d like to invite you to join our TF Grid Tester Community to meet other community members, discuss new improvements, and offer feedback.


ðŸ“° And be sure to dive in to the most recent ThreeFold Weekly to get your full update of recent happenings!
news.excerpt: TF Grid v3.6.0 is now live on testnet and available for public testing!
